home.proofTabs.0.label: Workspace
home.proofTabs.0.heading: Start in the same workspace we use every day.
home.proofTabs.0.body: Pick an engine, set duration and resolution, and the composer reveals the fields that engine expects. No waitlist, no mockups.
home.proofTabs.1.label: Price
home.proofTabs.1.heading: Wallet pricing updates before you press Generate.
home.proofTabs.1.body: Adjust settings and see the live “This render” chip before you commit. Funds only move when the render succeeds.
home.proofTabs.2.label: Tracking
home.proofTabs.2.heading: Job feed tracks every output automatically.
home.proofTabs.2.body: Review renders, compare takes, and grab downloads from the gallery rail as soon as they finish.
home.whyCards.0.title: Live product, not a roadmap.
home.whyCards.0.body: Log in and use the same workspace we run internally — pricing, composer, wallet, and job history are active today.
home.whyCards.1.title: Wallet-first billing.
home.whyCards.1.body: Top up once, monitor spend from the header, and refund automatically if a render fails.
home.whyCards.2.title: All your engines in one place.
home.whyCards.2.body: Switch between Sora, Veo, Pika, MiniMax, and Hunyuan without juggling dashboards or API keys.
home.ways.0.title: Generate
home.ways.0.description: Prompt with references, audio toggles, and model-specific controls — all with live pricing.
home.ways.1.title: Review & deliver
home.ways.1.description: Lock the best take, grab downloads, and share job links without leaving the workspace.
home.gallery.items.0.label: Veo 3 · Launch teaser
home.gallery.items.0.description: Narrative lighting with audio on for the campaign reveal.
home.gallery.items.1.label: Veo 3.1 Fast · Frame bridge
home.gallery.items.1.description: 8s bridge between a first and last frame using Veo 3.1 Fast.
home.gallery.items.2.label: MiniMax Hailuo 02 · Concept draft
home.gallery.items.2.description: Prompt optimiser enabled to block out a storyboard cut before the hero render.
pricing.faq.title: Micro-FAQ
pricing.faq.entries.0.question: How do credits work?
pricing.faq.entries.0.answer: Starter Credits load $10 into your wallet. Spend them like cash and top up whenever you need more runs.
pricing.faq.entries.1.question: Do they expire?
pricing.faq.entries.1.answer: No expiry. Balances roll forward month to month and sync across every teammate with access.
pricing.faq.entries.2.question: What if a generation fails?
pricing.faq.entries.2.answer: Failed renders auto-refund within minutes. You only pay when the job completes successfully.
pricing.faq.entries.3.question: What are member discounts?
pricing.faq.entries.3.answer: Spend $50 in 30 days to save 5%, $200 to save 10%. Savings apply automatically to every eligible run.

legal.terms.sections.0.heading: 1. Overview
legal.terms.sections.0.body: These Terms govern your use of MaxVideo AI. By accessing the service you agree to the obligations below.
legal.terms.sections.1.heading: 2. Accounts
legal.terms.sections.1.body: You are responsible for maintaining account security and ensuring teammates comply with these Terms.
legal.terms.sections.2.heading: 3. Usage
legal.terms.sections.2.body: Use MaxVideo AI in compliance with all applicable laws, respect licensing limits, and avoid prohibited content.
legal.terms.sections.3.heading: 4. Billing
legal.terms.sections.3.body: Wallet charges apply only to successful renders. Refunds are issued automatically for failed jobs.
legal.terms.sections.4.heading: 5. Liability
legal.terms.sections.4.body: MaxVideo AI is provided as-is. We limit liability to the maximum extent permitted by law.
legal.privacy.sections.0.heading: 1. Data we collect
legal.privacy.sections.0.body: Workspace details, usage metrics, and billing information needed to deliver the service.
legal.privacy.sections.1.heading: 2. How we use data
legal.privacy.sections.1.body: Operate routing, improve product quality, and communicate critical updates.
legal.privacy.sections.2.heading: 3. Storage & security
legal.privacy.sections.2.body: We store data in encrypted systems with least-privilege access. Render assets auto-expire per workspace policy.
legal.privacy.sections.3.heading: 4. Sharing
legal.privacy.sections.3.body: We only share data with underlying engine providers when routing renders. We never sell customer data.
legal.privacy.sections.4.heading: 5. Your choices
legal.privacy.sections.4.body: Request export or deletion any time via support@maxvideo.ai. Admins control retention windows.
changelog.entries.0.title: Veo templates + queue transparency
changelog.entries.0.body: Added Veo V2 routing, queue length indicator on Price-Before chip, and shared wallet notifications.
changelog.entries.1.title: Refund automation
changelog.entries.1.body: Automatic refunds now trigger within 90 seconds when renders fail or providers error out.
changelog.entries.2.title: Brand kit hand-off
changelog.entries.2.body: Workflows export brand kits into FCPXML and AE JSON for post teams.
status.systems.2.detail: Payments, refunds, and receipts running normally.
status.incidents.0.title: Pika provider latency
status.incidents.0.summary: Pika queue delays for 34 minutes. Auto refunds triggered for impacted renders.
